ITEM.SOURCE: ` o_job_monitoring->add_thread( jobname = jobname jobcount = jobid ).

` DATA length TYPE i.
super->constructor( ).
length = XSTRLEN( run_id ). * ASSERT factory_mode IS NOT INITIAL OR length = 16. ASSERT run_id IS INITIAL OR length = 16.
IF run_id IS NOT INITIAL. me->process_id = generate_new_process_id( ). CREATE OBJECT o_job_monitoring. CREATE OBJECT o_categories. CREATE OBJECT me->o_messaging EXPORTING process_id = me->process_id o_categories = me->o_categories. CREATE OBJECT me->o_objects EXPORTING o_run = me o_messaging = me->o_messaging. SET HANDLER me->handle_objects_confirmation FOR me->o_objects. SET HANDLER handle_submit_thread FOR o_job_monitoring. SET HANDLER handle_before_sleep_mode FOR o_job_monitoring. is_new = abap_true. ELSE. is_new = abap_false. me->process_id = run_id. read( ). ENDIF.

ITEM.SOURCE: ` * DATA run_id TYPE td_process_id. * * factory_mode = abap_true. * CREATE OBJECT result * EXPORTING * run_id = run_id. * CLEAR factory_mode. * * IF categories IS BOUND. result->o_categories = categories. ELSE. CREATE OBJECT result->o_categories. ENDIF. * CREATE OBJECT result->o_messaging * EXPORTING * process_id = result->process_id * o_categories = result->o_categories. * CREATE OBJECT result->o_objects * EXPORTING * o_run = result * o_messaging = result->o_messaging. * SET HANDLER result->handle_objects_confirmation FOR result->o_objects. * * result->set_thread_count( thread_count ). * result->set_bloc_size( bloc_size ). * result->set_weight_fn( weight_fn ). * result->set_max_memory( max_memory ).

ITEM.TEXT: Handle BEFORE_SLEEP_MODE event of Job Monitoring

ITEM.SOURCE: ` IF NOT o_messaging->handle_messages( ) IS INITIAL. o_job_monitoring->cancel_next_sleep( ). ENDIF.

` DATA _left TYPE i.
_left = o_objects->total_objects - o_objects->processed_objects.
* CALL METHOD _lock * EXPORTING * run_id = run_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>run_info * EXCEPTIONS * foreign_lock = 1 * sys_failure = 2 * OTHERS = 3. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * RAISE failed. * ENDIF.
UPDATE ygplmt_runs SET obj_left = _left WHERE run_id = process_id. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * ROLLBACK WORK. * CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>run_info ). * RAISE failed. * ENDIF. * * ADD object_count TO processed_objects. * * CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id * cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>run_info ).

ITEM.TEXT: Handle SUBMIT_THREAD event of Job Monitoring => Raise event

ITEM.SOURCE: ` RAISE EVENT submit_thread EXPORTING jobcount = jobcount jobname = jobname thread_number = thread_number.

`
lock_exclusive( ). * Lock released with commit. UPDATE ygplmt_runs SET blocs = bloc_count WHERE run_id = process_id. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

ITEM.TEXT: Requested size of bloc counted in weight unit if provided

ITEM.SOURCE: ` CHECK infos-bloc_size <> bloc_size. f_has_changed = abap_true. infos-bloc_size = bloc_size.
` CHECK o_categories IS BOUND. CHECK o_messaging IS BOUND. o_messaging->set_category( o_categories ).

ITEM.TEXT: Maximum memory size task might use

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA o_msg TYPE to_messaging. DATA it_list TYPE ygpl_mt_job_monitoring=>tt_joblist. FIELD-SYMBOLS <j> LIKE LINE OF it_list.
CHECK me->max_memory <> max_memory. o_job_monitoring->check_active_threads( ). IF o_job_monitoring->threads > 0. * Task running it_list = o_job_monitoring->get_job_list( ). LOOP AT it_list ASSIGNING <j>. * Send message ENDLOOP. ENDIF. me->max_memory = max_memory.
` CHECK o_job_monitoring IS BOUND. CHECK infos-threads <> thread_count. f_has_changed = abap_true. IF o_job_monitoring->threads = 0. infos-threads = thread_count. ELSE. * To do ENDIF.

ITEM.TEXT: Change the field name of weight field

ITEM.SOURCE: ` me->weight_fn = weight_fn.
` o_job_monitoring->start_threads( infos-threads ).
` o_job_monitoring->wait_progress( ).

` DATA _bs TYPE td_bloc_size. DATA _count TYPE i.
* Check Objects DESCRIBE TABLE objects LINES _count. CHECK _count >= 1.
* Check Bloc_Size IF infos-bloc_size < 1. infos-bloc_size = 1. ENDIF.
o_objects->add_objects( objects = objects bloc_size = infos-bloc_size weight_fn = me->weight_fn dependencies = dependencies ).

` DATA _key TYPE string. DATA user TYPE sy-uname.
ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>check_lock_mode( lock_mode ).
CALL FUNCTION 'ENQUEUE_EYGPLMT_RUNS' EXPORTING mode_ygplmt_runs = lock_mode mandt = sy-mandt run_id = process_id x_run_id = abap_true _scope = '2' _wait = abap_true _collect = ' ' EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 system_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc = 1. user = sy-msgv1. _key = process_id. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_locks EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_locks=>foreign_lock object_name = 'MT Process Data'(tds) object_key = _key user = user. * else if sy-subrc <> 0. ELSE. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. ENDIF.

` ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>check_lock_mode( lock_mode ).
CALL FUNCTION 'DEQUEUE_EYGPLMT_RUNS' EXPORTING mode_ygplmt_runs = lock_mode mandt = sy-mandt run_id = process_id x_run_id = abap_true _scope = '2' _synchron = ' ' _collect = ' '.
` super->lock_exclusive( ). _lock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-write process_id = me->process_id ).
` super->lock_with_share( ). _lock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-read process_id = me->process_id ).

` DATA _run TYPE ygplmt_runs.
* Do the lock super->read( ).
SELECT SINGLE * INTO _run FROM ygplmt_runs WHERE run_id = process_id. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.
unlock_with_share( ).
times-start = _run-timestamp. MOVE-CORRESPONDING _run TO infos.

` DATA _run TYPE ygplmt_runs.
* CHECK from_factory = abap_true. super->save( ).
_run-run_id = process_id. _run-threads = infos-threads. _run-obj_left = o_objects->total_objects. _run-bloc_size = infos-bloc_size. _run-timestamp = times-start. _run-blocs = o_objects->total_blocs_count. MODIFY ygplmt_runs FROM _run. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.
` _unlock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-write process_id = me->process_id ). super->unlock_exclusive( ) .
` _unlock( lock_mode = ygpl_mt_lock_managment=>lock_modes-read process_id = me->process_id ). super->unlock_with_share( ).
